nodes.text: Cybloc was a greenish planet orbiting the star Erg Es 992 in the Meridian sector. During the Clone Wars there was a space station in orbit over the planet. Darth Maul and his brother Savage Opress broke into the space station and stole some credits. One of its moons, Cybloc XII, housed a New Republic trade base. However, the region was purged during the Death Seed incident.
